oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Q.M. Smith in front of Smith Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Quintin Miller Smith standing on the steps of Smith Hall. Smith was an MTSU student from 1911-1913, the MTSU president from 1938-1958, and a state and local civic leader until his death in 1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smith, Quintin Miller; College presidents; College buildings; Middle Tennessee State College
